head.title: ING CONSIDERS SELLING AMERICAN BANKING BUSINESS

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Banking, Finance and Insurance

hedline.hl1: ING CONSIDERS SELLING AMERICAN BANKING BUSINESS

abstract.p: ING weighs sale of its US investment banking business, ING Barings (S)

block.p: ING, the Dutch financial services company, is considering the sale of its United States investment banking business, ING Barings, executives close to the company said yesterday. The company has hired Goldman, Sachs to advise it, and although the discussions are focusing on the American unit, they might also extend to ING's other investment banking operations in Asia, Europe and Latin America. Shedding the investment banking operation would be a turnaround for ING, which has been trying to bolster its investment banking businesses and has been expanding in the United States, mostly in insurance.

ING, the Dutch financial services company, is considering the sale of its United States investment banking business, ING Barings, executives close to the company said yesterday. The company has hired Goldman, Sachs to advise it, and although the discussions are focusing on the American unit, they might also extend to ING's other investment banking operations in Asia, Europe and Latin America. Shedding the investment banking operation would be a turnaround for ING, which has been trying to bolster its investment banking businesses and has been expanding in the United States, mostly in insurance.
